Ingredients:

* 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
* 2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves
* 2 garlic cloves, minced
* 1/4 cup dry white wine
* 1/4 cup chicken broth

6. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
7. Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil. Place the snails on the foil, belly side down. If using escargot shells, place one shell upside down on top of each snail.
